Directions
Combine tomatoes, scallions, cilantro, and chili in a small bowl. Season generously with salt and let sit 2 minutes until salt dissolves. Add water and stir to combine.
Serious Eats / Diana Chistruga
Make-Ahead and Storage
Ají can be eaten immediately or stored in a sealed container in the refrigerator for up to 5 days
